posts.post_content:
Anyone else out there collecting these?

I need three to complete my collection:

Harry Lord at Third,
Held at Third,
Stahl Safe.

I'd also like to upgrade:

Devlin Gets His Man,
McIntyre at Bat,

Anyone have any of these?
 
I'd really prefer to trade as, though they're not expensive, they're hard to get.  I could of course split up a whole card to get the middle panel, but I don't want to do that.

The scans below show what I have available for trade or sale.
Note: I don't know what the "gridwork" is that appears irregularly on every card in the scan; it's the scan [This is the highest resolution Net54 allows me.  Maybe it's the plastic sleeves?]; there is no such gridwork on the cards.
